MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L21 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Sefton Avenue, Eaton Avenue, Bridge Road, Penrhyn Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:07 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:45 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:49 am on 13th January, 2021.
